service.name: bclconvertmanager
service.summary: Service monitoring the status of raw data converstion via Bcl Convert.

publishes.name: WorkflowRunStateChange
publishes.summary: Event represents a change in the state of a workflow execution.

subscribes.name: WorkflowRunStateChange
subscribes.summary: Event represents a change in the state of a workflow execution.

markdown.content:
The bclconvertmanager service is our own internal service that listens to events from ICAv2 and relays status updates to via our internal WorkflowRunStateChange events. 

<NodeGraph />
